author: Craig
text: I placed a bid/order then did not hear anything for weeks until I found out the item wasn't available. Meanwhile my debit card was charged, although it was later reimbursed. Poor communication and customer service all around.
title: I placed a bid/order then did not hear…

author: Sharaf
text: Delivery the worst
title: Delivery the worst

author: Marcos A
text: Not helpful at all. Website goes around in circles. Looking for a link to the live chat is imposible and now I’m here with two major companies that don’t talk to each other and my sneakers are missing.
title: Not helpful at all

author: Charles
text: You sold me some fake ass shoes and tried telling me they would pass as a deadstock! Never again will I spend anything from you again.
title: You sold me some fake ass shoes and…

author: Cuban
text: I still haven’t received anything from stock x on an order I put in almost a month ago
title: No package

author: kamilah
text: I ordered the shoes and it took forever to get them. Apparently, the seller never came through with the shoes.  So I had to wait for them to get the shoes from somewhere else.
title: I ordered the shoes and it took forever…

author: Phantom
text: You should be able to cancel within the first 2 hours of purchase.
title: You should be able to cancel within the…

author: Kavone
text: The shipping took forever, ups doesn't conduct business on easter Sunday, or Monday. Shipment arrived in my city a tuesday morning and wasn't delivered for nearly 48 hours later. I felt like I paid a premium for the product and stockx service but they used the slowest shipping possible. In hindsight. If I pay for such services, I expect a quicker shipping method.
title: The shipping took forever

author: Michael
text: I ordered a pair of shoes off of stock x, they were delivered to my building and I never got them. The building told me that they mailed them back because they didn’t recognize my name. Now stockx won’t refund me or mail me my shoes again. Never buy from them
title: I ordered a pair of shoes off of stockx and never got them

author: Peter Ian Staker
text: its f2cking late by idk know how many days because im told by three different sources its supposed to come by different times but its still late by all of them so either stop scamming ppl or get a better delivery service ya c2nts
title: SH2T

text: The shoes smell like cigarette smoke
title: The shoes smell like cigarette smoke

text: ordered a hoodie and a couple days went by waiting for the seller to ship it then out of nowhere my order disapeard and i have not been issued a refund

text: Did get my sneakers it was canceled fuk stockX

author: chiro
text: Worst experience ever wouldn’t recommend buying from this site.
title: Worst experience ever…

author: Aaron
text:
Bought a ps5. Was supposedly verified to be brand new and working. Revieved it and it does come on but does not connect to the playstation network due to the previous user getting the console banned for running a scam through the network. 

Playstation cannot do anything about this. Was told to get back in contact with previous user for refund. Reached out to customer service yesterday and haven't heard back.
title: Bought a ps5

author: Berjit
text:
My shipment was continually delayed due to the individual delaying the shipment of the shoe to StockX.

Once received, I am now having to address the matter of authenticity of the shoe purchased as there looks to be an in-discrepancy of the show soles not being authentic Air Jordans..
title: My shipment delayes & Authenticity of the Shoes being real...

author: cornelius
text: It took nearly 3 weeks to get the shoes. By time I received the shoes they were dropping in store at retail price. I basically could’ve waited with how long it took to receive these shoes. The GOAT app is a lot faster for basically same price
title: It took nearly 3 weeks to get the…

author: Michael
text: Went to buy a pair of shoes and it went through. Then a week later got a message saying it was cancelled and refunded with no explanation why.
title: Went to buy a pair of shoes and it went…

author: Sanjeev
text: Didn't recieve my nike shoes worth 206$ and they say it was delivered.
title: Didn't recieve my nike shoes worth 206$…

author: Judy
text: It took a long time to receive. Then I got the wrong size. I ordered a size 13 & received a 141/2. I am trying to figure out how to return & get my money back.
title: It took a long time to receive and got the wrong size.
